mapper.insert: insert into subscriptions (subscription_sid, user_sid, plan_sid, status, started_at, expires_at, updated_at) values (#{subscriptionSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{planSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expiresAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update subscriptions set user_sid = #{userSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, plan_sid = #{planSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, started_at = #{startedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, expires_at = #{expiresAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where subscription_sid = #{subscriptionSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select subscription_sid, user_sid, plan_sid, status, started_at, expires_at, updated_at from subscriptions
